briefdescription.para: Number of vertex positions in the entire mesh.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.

simplesect.para: meshIndex must be less than the value returned by getMeshCount.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.

simplesect.para: meshIndex must be less than the value returned by getMeshCount.

parameterdescription.para: The index of the vertex position in the zero-indexed array of vertex positions.

simplesect.para: vertexIndex must be less than the value returned by getVertexPositionCount.
The vertices are sorted by the vertex ID.
The vertex position.

briefdescription.para: List of all vertex position X values for the referenced mesh.

simplesect.para: This is an advanced API for performance critical access, for more convenient usage see getVertexPosition.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.

simplesect.para: meshIndex must be less than the value returned by getMeshCount.
View over all X values.

briefdescription.para: List of all vertex position Y values for the referenced mesh.

simplesect.para: This is an advanced API for performance critical access, for more convenient usage see getVertexPosition.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.

simplesect.para: meshIndex must be less than the value returned by getMeshCount.
View over all Y values.

briefdescription.para: List of all vertex position Z values for the referenced mesh.

simplesect.para: This is an advanced API for performance critical access, for more convenient usage see getVertexPosition.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.

simplesect.para: meshIndex must be less than the value returned by getMeshCount.
View over all Z values.

briefdescription.para: Number of texture coordinates in the entire mesh.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.

simplesect.para: meshIndex must be less than the value returned by getMeshCount.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.

simplesect.para: meshIndex must be less than the value returned by getMeshCount.

parameterdescription.para: The index of the texture coordinate in the zero-indexed array of texture coordinates.

simplesect.para: textureCoordinateIndex must be less than the value returned by getVertexTextureCoordinateCount.
The texture coordinate.

briefdescription.para: List of all texture coordinate U values for the referenced mesh.

simplesect.para: This is an advanced API for performance critical access, for more convenient usage see getVertexTextureCoordinate.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.

simplesect.para: meshIndex must be less than the value returned by getMeshCount.
View over all U values.

briefdescription.para: List of all texture coordinate V values for the referenced mesh.

simplesect.para: This is an advanced API for performance critical access, for more convenient usage see getVertexTextureCoordinate.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.

simplesect.para: meshIndex must be less than the value returned by getMeshCount.
View over all V values.

briefdescription.para: Number of vertex normals in the entire mesh.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.

simplesect.para: meshIndex must be less than the value returned by getMeshCount.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.

simplesect.para: meshIndex must be less than the value returned by getMeshCount.

parameterdescription.para: The index of the vertex normal in the zero-indexed array of vertex normals.

simplesect.para: normalIndex must be less than the value returned by getVertexNormalCount.
The vertex normal.

briefdescription.para: List of all normal X values for the referenced mesh.

simplesect.para: This is an advanced API for performance critical access, for more convenient usage see getVertexNormal.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.

simplesect.para: meshIndex must be less than the value returned by getMeshCount.

briefdescription.para: List of all normal Y value for the referenced meshs.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.

simplesect.para: meshIndex must be less than the value returned by getMeshCount.

briefdescription.para: List of all normal Z values for the referenced mesh.

simplesect.para: This is an advanced API for performance critical access, for more convenient usage see getVertexNormal.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.

simplesect.para: meshIndex must be less than the value returned by getMeshCount.

briefdescription.para: Number of vertex layouts in the entire mesh.

simplesect.para: A vertex layout is a collection of vertex attributes.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.

simplesect.para: meshIndex must be less than the value returned by getMeshCount.

briefdescription.para: Vertex layouts contain only attribute indices which can be used to query the actual attributes, such as positions, texture coordinates and normals, which are associated with the vertex.

simplesect.para: The indices from a layout are usable with the above defined APIs.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.

simplesect.para: meshIndex must be less than the value returned by getMeshCount.

parameterdescription.para: The index of the layout in the zero-indexed array of vertex layouts.

simplesect.para: layoutIndex must be less than the value returned by getVertexLayoutCount.

briefdescription.para: Position indices for each vertex of the referenced mesh.

simplesect.para: This is an advanced API for performance critical access, for more convenient usage see getVertexLayout.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.

simplesect.para: meshIndex must be less than the value returned by getMeshCount.
View over all vertex position indices values.

briefdescription.para: Texture coordinate indices for each vertex of the referenced mesh.

simplesect.para: This is an advanced API for performance critical access, for more convenient usage see getVertexLayout.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.

simplesect.para: meshIndex must be less than the value returned by getMeshCount.
View over all vertex texture coordinate indices.

briefdescription.para: Normal indices for each vertex of the referenced mesh.

simplesect.para: This is an advanced API for performance critical access, for more convenient usage see getVertexLayout.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.

simplesect.para: meshIndex must be less than the value returned by getMeshCount.
View over all vertex normal indices.

briefdescription.para: Number of faces that belong to the specified mesh.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.

simplesect.para: meshIndex must be less than the value returned by getMeshCount.

briefdescription.para: List of vertex layout indices the belong to a face on the specified mesh.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.

simplesect.para: meshIndex must be less than the value returned by getMeshCount.

parameterdescription.para: A face's position in the zero-indexed array of faces that belong to the above referenced mesh.

simplesect.para: faceIndex must be less than the value returned by getFaceCount.
View over the list of vertex layout indices.

briefdescription.para: The maximum number of joints that may influence any single vertex.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.

simplesect.para: meshIndex must be less than the value returned by getMeshCount.

briefdescription.para: Number of skin weights associated with the specified mesh.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.

simplesect.para: meshIndex must be less than the value returned by getMeshCount.

briefdescription.para: List of skin weights influencing the requested vertex.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.

simplesect.para: meshIndex must be less than the value returned by getMeshCount.

parameterdescription.para: A position in the zero-indexed array of vertices.

simplesect.para: vertexIndex must be less than the value returned by getVertexPositionCount.
View over the list of skin weights.

briefdescription.para: List of joint indices associated with each skin weight for the specified vertex.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.

simplesect.para: meshIndex must be less than the value returned by getMeshCount.

parameterdescription.para: A position in the zero-indexed array of vertices.

simplesect.para: vertexIndex must be less than the value returned by getVertexPositionCount.
The joint indices are stored in the same order as the weights they are associated with.
View over the list of joint indices.

briefdescription.para: Number of blend shapes that belong to the specified mesh.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.

simplesect.para: meshIndex must be less than the value returned by getMeshCount.

briefdescription.para: The matching blend shape channel index of the requested blend shape target.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.

simplesect.para: meshIndex must be less than the value returned by getMeshCount.

parameterdescription.para: A position in the zero-indexed array of blend shape targets within the specified mesh.

simplesect.para: blendShapeTargetIndex must be less than the value returned by getBlendShapeTargetCount.
DefinitionReader::getBlendShapeName

briefdescription.para: Number of deltas that belong to the specified blend shape.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.

simplesect.para: meshIndex must be less than the value returned by getMeshCount.

parameterdescription.para: A position in the zero-indexed array of blend shape targets within the specified mesh.

simplesect.para: blendShapeTargetIndex must be less than the value returned by getBlendShapeTargetCount.

memberdef.argsstring: (std::uint16_t meshIndex, std::uint16_t blendShapeTargetIndex, std::uint32_t deltaIndex) const =0
memberdef.name: getBlendShapeTargetDelta

briefdescription.para: List of deltas for each affected vertex.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.

simplesect.para: meshIndex must be less than the value returned by getMeshCount.

parameterdescription.para: A position in the zero-indexed array of blend shape targets within the specified mesh.

simplesect.para: blendShapeTargetIndex must be less than the value returned by getBlendShapeTargetCount.

parameterdescription.para: A position in the zero-indexed array of blend shapes deltas.

simplesect.para: deltaIndex must be less than the value returned by getBlendShapeTargetDeltaCount.

briefdescription.para: List of all delta X values for the referenced blend shape target.

simplesect.para: This is an advanced API for performance critical access, for more convenient usage see getBlendShapeTargetDelta.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.

simplesect.para: meshIndex must be less than the value returned by getMeshCount.

parameterdescription.para: A position in the zero-indexed array of blend shape targets within the specified mesh.

simplesect.para: blendShapeTargetIndex must be less than the value returned by getBlendShapeTargetCount.
View over all X values.

briefdescription.para: List of all delta Y values for the referenced blend shape target.

simplesect.para: This is an advanced API for performance critical access, for more convenient usage see getBlendShapeTargetDelta.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.

simplesect.para: meshIndex must be less than the value returned by getMeshCount.

parameterdescription.para: A position in the zero-indexed array of blend shape targets within the specified mesh.

simplesect.para: blendShapeTargetIndex must be less than the value returned by getBlendShapeTargetCount.
View over all Y values.

briefdescription.para: List of all delta Z values for the referenced blend shape target.

simplesect.para: This is an advanced API for performance critical access, for more convenient usage see getBlendShapeTargetDelta.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.

simplesect.para: meshIndex must be less than the value returned by getMeshCount.

parameterdescription.para: A position in the zero-indexed array of blend shape targets within the specified mesh.

simplesect.para: blendShapeTargetIndex must be less than the value returned by getBlendShapeTargetCount.
View over all Z values.

briefdescription.para: Vertex position indices affected by the referenced blend shape target.

parameterdescription.para: A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of meshes.

simplesect.para: meshIndex must be less than the value returned by getMeshCount.

parameterdescription.para: A position in the zero-indexed array of blend shape targets within the specified mesh.

simplesect.para: blendShapeTargetIndex must be less than the value returned by getBlendShapeTargetCount.
The vertex position indices are stored in the same order as the deltas they are associated with. These indices can be used to query the associated vertices themselves through getVertexPosition.
View over the list of vertex position indices.

briefdescription.para: Read-only accessors to the geometry data associated with a rig.

simplesect.para: Implementors should inherit from Reader itself and not this class.
